document.full_text: gunfire rocked ouagadougou, the capital, for more than three hours overnight on wednesday in what an army source said was a protest by soldiers against arrests of their colleagues.
document.title: africa: burkina faso: gunfire breaks out
lines_and_colors: gunfire rocked ouagadougou, the capital, for more than three hours overnight on wednesday in what an army source said was a protest by soldiers against arrests of their colleagues.
